name: Tank Attack (Rajcsányi László (WLS))
description:
This is a homebrought game, run on Gameboy Color. Original version: John P. Shay - Solar Software Ltd., Commodore 16/Plus4, 1986. Created with GB-Studio 2.0.0 beta5!

Also available for download in .CIA format for the Nintendo 3DS virtual console!

Guide your Tank along the screen, avoiding your opponents fire. Blast your way through the trenches and blow up the enemy tank before he destroys you. In two-player mode, the tank automatically moves to the right and then to the left. When the player fires the gun, the tank will start moving in the other direction. You have three tanks each per game. Good luck.  

Move: Cursor LEFT/RIGHT
Fire: B 

Move: LEFT/RIGHT
Fire: X

Tank Attack - Solar Software

Creators webpage (WLS): Tank Attack
